text: Pico Far East Holdings Limited is an event marketing company founded in 1969 by Chia Siong Lim, was named Pico Art Studio. It Incorporated in Singapore as a private limited company delivering exhibition stand-building work. It was listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange under the name Pico Far East Holdings Limited, the chairman of the group is Lawrence Chia. Other than traditional event management and exhibition design and building, Pico has also been developing digital solutions for years to make events more sustainable, accountable and accessible by harnessing cutting-edge but proven technologies. Pico Virtuosity is their own suite of innovative and agile solutions to deliver high-performance virtual events with real emotion. Alibaba Cloud Virtual Showroom and the China Mobile’s Global Virtual · Reality Conference are some of the cases that best exemplify their digital capabilities. == History == Pico was founded in 1969, it is a global agency with some 2,400 professionals working in 34 cities worldwide. Pico is building large operations and production facilities in Beijing and Shanghai called Pico Creative Centres. The bulk of Pico's work has involved designing and building exhibition stands and managing and providing services at mega-events like World Expos or Olympic Games. == Stock exchange == Pico Far East Holdings Limited has been listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange since 1992 (Stock code: 752.HK). Our associate company, Pico (Thailand) Public Company Limited was also listed on Thailand’s MAI in 2004 (Stock code: PICO). == Subsidiaries and affiliates == Pico subsidiaries and affiliates: === Pico+ === Three subsidiaries of Pico are under the subsidiaries network Pico+: * TBA Creative Network ** TBA Creative Network is a brand activation agency.
